SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 30
vCard: An Ontology for visit cards 
• vCard automates the 
exchange of personal 
and organization 
information typically 
found on a traditional 
business card. 
• RDF Classes:  
• Vcard  
• Name 
• Address 
• Organisation, 
• Location  
• Label 
• Tel  
• Email.  
31 
http://www.w3.org/Submission/vcard-rdf/
